attributes.background: 2 ladies were friends-then parnters,before the law change,and again just friends back in 2003,before the law changed,i allowed my friend to remain living under my roof,notifing all authoritys,landord-housing benifitetc,in june 2008,my friend leaving one job-to jsa for 4 weeks-to another job, i was on income support-and told we are stopping your income right back from 05/12/05 when the law changed-and you will owe payback from then,include housing benifit/c/tax ,18,000-23,000 all because ,i'm being told because she still lives here ,they are presuming we are still a couple,and i have not had any money from 05/06/08 at all-result being the lose of my home,so am selling off the contents because i have no where for them to go,living off that at the moment,civil partners or not this is a strange position to find your self in,when i go shopping,my friend comes too,when i cook me and my son a meal,i cook her one too,when we eat in the front room and my friend does too-sometimes? all this means we are co-habitating-please look into this matter,as i don't see how you proove all this is not what they income support totton,are saying we areparnters,when we arenotpartners,
